name: Sunday Brunch: Cheese Strata
description: What is a cheese strata? Well, I found and adapted this recipe in the classic American Century Bookbook, so I'll let the terrifically talented author Jean Anderson describe it for you: "buttered slices of bread layered into a casserole with...
recipeIngredient: 3 cups coarsely shredded sharp cheddar cheese

recipeInstructions.text: Spread each slice of bread with butter on one side, then quarter the slices. Layer bread and cheese alternately in ungreased 2-to 2 1/2 quart casserole, beginning with bread and ending with cheese.
Whisk together eggs, milk, mustard, salt, and cayenne and pour evenly over bread mixture.
Bake uncovered, until set like custard-40 to 45 minutes.
